function.name: extract_key_financial_data
function.description: Based on the user's question and all contextual information, reason step by step internally and provide structured output strictly following this schema.

user_question.description: Repeat the original question exactly as it is.

key_financial_data.description: Based on the earnings call transcript, extract and organize key financial data. If a field is not mentioned, return null for that field. For any non-null field value you return, you MUST include the "paragraph_number" where the source data appears in the transcript. If the value is inferred or calculated (e.g., taking a midpoint of a range), you MUST include the use the "paragraph_number" where the original reference occurred.

total_revenue_for_this_quarter.description: Total revenue for the current quarter. Return null if unavailable.

value_vocabulary.description: Numerical value exactly as stated in the transcript, without any scaling, normalization, or conversion. For example: if transcript says 'a billion', return 'a' with unit 'billion'. DO NOT multiply or convert units. The number and the unit must remain consistent with how it appears in the transcript.

unit.description: Unit of magnitude exactly as reported in the transcript (e.g., million, billion, thousand). Must correspond directly to value_vocabulary. Example: if transcript says 'a billion', return value_vocabulary='a' and unit='billion'.

currency_code.description: ISO 4217 currency code, e.g., USD, CNY, EUR

speaker.description: Name or role of the speaker who provided this number in the transcript, e.g., 'CFO', 'CEO', or 'John Smith'.

paragraph_number.description: The sequential number of the paragraph in the transcript where this information was mentioned. Useful for traceability.

gaap_gross_margin_for_this_quarter.description: GAAP gross margin (gross profit as a percentage of revenue) for the current quarter, as disclosed in the transcript. May appear as 'gross margin', 'GAAP gross margin', or 'gross profit margin'. Return null if unavailable.

value_vocabulary.description: Numerical percentage value extracted from transcript, e.g., 72.5 for 72.5%

unit.description: Always use '%' to indicate margin is expressed as a percentage.

speaker.description: Name or role of the speaker who provided this number in the transcript, e.g., 'CFO', 'CEO', or 'John Smith'.

paragraph_number.description: The sequential number of the paragraph in the transcript where this information was mentioned. Useful for traceability.

non_gaap_gross_margin_for_this_quarter.description: non-GAAP gross margin (gross profit as a percentage of revenue) for the current quarter, as disclosed in the transcript. May appear as 'gross margin', 'GAAP gross margin', or 'gross profit margin'. Return null if unavailable.

value_vocabulary.description: Numerical percentage value extracted from transcript, e.g., 72.5 for 72.5%

unit.description: Always use '%' to indicate margin is expressed as a percentage.

speaker.description: Name or role of the speaker who provided this number in the transcript, e.g., 'CFO', 'CEO', or 'John Smith'.

paragraph_number.description: The sequential number of the paragraph in the transcript where this information was mentioned. Useful for traceability.

gaap_operating_expense_for_this_quarter.description: GAAP operating expenses(OpEx) for the current quarter, as reported in the transcript. Represents total costs and expenses incurred in operations under GAAP (e.g., R&D, SG&A). Return null if unavailable.

value_vocabulary.description: Numerical value exactly as stated in the transcript, without any scaling, normalization, or conversion. For example: if transcript says 'a billion', return 'a' with unit 'billion'. DO NOT multiply or convert units. The number and the unit must remain consistent with how it appears in the transcript.

unit.description: Unit of magnitude exactly as reported in the transcript (e.g., million, billion, thousand). Must correspond directly to value_vocabulary. Example: if transcript says 'a billion', return value_vocabulary='a' and unit='billion'.

currency_code.description: ISO 4217 currency code, e.g., USD, CNY, EUR

speaker.description: Name or role of the speaker who provided this number in the transcript, e.g., 'CFO', 'CEO', or 'John Smith'.

paragraph_number.description: The sequential number of the paragraph in the transcript where this information was mentioned. Useful for traceability.

non_gaap_operating_expense_for_this_quar.description: Non-GAAP operating expenses(OpEx) for the current quarter, as reported in the transcript. Return null if unavailable.
